Reference

geometries

paramatrise or sketch geometries

gs_point()

Create a point geometry

gs_polygon() gs_triangle() gs_square() gs_rectangle() gs_hexagon()

Create a polygon geometry

gs_random()

Create a geometry randomly

gs_tiles()

Create a regular tiling geometry

geom-class

Geometry class (S4) and methods

getters and setters

methods that standardise dealing with spatial objects

getCoords(<geom>) getCoords(<Spatial>) getCoords(<sf>)

Get the table of coordinates of a spatial object.

getCRS(<geom>) getCRS(<Spatial>) getCRS(<sf>) getCRS(<Raster>)

Get the coordinate reference system of a spatial object.

setCRS(<geom>) setCRS(<Spatial>) setCRS(<sf>) setCRS(<Raster>)

Set (or transform) the coordinate reference system of a spatial object.

getExtent(<geom>) getExtent(<Spatial>) getExtent(<sf>) getExtent(<Raster>) getExtent(<matrix>)

Get the extent (bounding box) of a spatial object.

getHistory(<geom>) getHistory(<RasterLayer>) getHistory(<RasterBrick>) getHistory(<RasterStack>)

Get the history of a spatial object.

getSubset(<geom>) getSubset(<Spatial>) getSubset(<sf>)

Get the subset of a spatial object.

getTable(<geom>) getTable(<Spatial>) getTable(<sf>) getTable(<RasterLayer>)

Get the attribute table of a spatial object.

setTable(<geom>) setTable(<Spatial>) setTable(<sf>) setTable(<RasterLayer>)

Set the attribute table of a spatial object.

getWindow(<geom>)

Get the reference window of a spatial object.

setWindow(<geom>)

Set the reference window of a spatial object.

utilities

functions that modify geometries

gt_as_geom()

Derive a geom from other spatial objects

gt_as_grob()

Transform geometry to grob

gt_as_raster()

Transform geometry to raster

gt_as_sp()

Transform geometry to spatial object

gt_group()

Group geometries

gt_rotate()

Rotate geometries

gt_scale()

Scale geometries

visualise

plot spatial objects and locate coordinates

visualise()

Visualise raster and geom objects

setTheme()

Create a new theme

locate()

Locate (and identify) clicks

example data

data that are used throughout the documentation

gtGeoms

Example geom objects

gtSP

Example Spatial objects

gtSF

Example sf objects
